item.title: Bovino is set to leave Minneapolis as Trump reshuffles the leadership of his immigration crackdown
item.description: A federal judge is considering Minnesota’s challenge to the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.

item.title: In their words: An examination of statements Trump officials made about what led to Pretti’s death
